data.comment: The match is underway in Ufa.
Free kick for Ufa in the half of Khimki.
In the minute 3, Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
Khimki have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Ufa at Neftyanik Stadium.
In the minute 5, Khimki take a 0-1 lead thanks to Ilya Kukharchuk.
Great play from Aleksandr Troshechkin to set up the goal.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a Ufa throw-in in Khimki's half.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
Throw-in for Khimki in the half of Ufa.
Throw-in high up the field for Khimki in Ufa.
In the minute 9, Ufa have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
Khimki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Stanislav Vasilev awards Khimki a goal kick.
In the minute 11, The match at Neftyanik Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Konstantin Pliyev, who is down injured.
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ufa's Konstantin Pliyev is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 13, Stanislav Vasilev blows against Ufa's Timur Zhamaletdinov for offside.
Can Ufa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Khimki's half?
In Ufa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 15, Ufa are caught offside.
Stanislav Vasilev awards the away team a throw-in.
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 17, In Ufa Ufa drive forward through Timur Zhamaletdinov. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Ufa.
Konstantin Pliyev (Ufa) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 17, It's a goal kick for the away team in Ufa.
Kirill Folmer for Ufa drives towards goal at Neftyanik Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Ufa in their own half.
In the minute 19, Ufa to take a throw-in in Khimki territory.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Khimki.
Ufa surge into the attack at Neftyanik Stadium but Timur Zhamaletdinov’s header is off-target.
In the minute 22, Ball goes out of play for a Khimki goal kick.
Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
Free kick Ufa.
In the minute 23, Throw-in Khimki.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Ufa just outside Khimki's area.
In the minute 26, Attention is being given to Khimki’s Dmitri Tikhiy and play has been suspended briefly.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Kirill Folmer gets his shot on target but fails to score for Ufa.
In the minute 30, Stanislav Vasilev signals a Khimki throw-in in Ufa's half.
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Khimki's Dmitri Tikhiy looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 31, Ball safe as Ufa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball safe as Ufa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Ufa to check on Bojan Jokic, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 32, Goal kick for Ufa at Neftyanik Stadium.
Bojan Jokic is back on the pitch.
Throw-in for Ufa in the half of Khimki.
In the minute 35, Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Ufa.
Timur Zhamaletdinov (Ufa) strikes at Neftyanik Stadium but his header is cleared.
Khimki's Vladimir Dyadyun gets in a shot on goal at Neftyanik Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to Khimki.
Goal! Khimki extend their lead to 0-2 through Aleksandr Troshechkin.
Mohamed Konate with an assist there.
Can Khimki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ufa's half?
In the minute 39, Aleksandr Sukhov (Ufa) has received a yellow card from Stanislav Vasilev.
Throw-in Khimki.
In the minute 40, Ufa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
Khimki to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Khimki in the half of Ufa.
In the minute 44, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Jemal Tabidze.
Free kick Ufa.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Jemal Tabidze is back on his feet again.
Vladimir Dyadyun gets his shot on target but fails to score for Khimki.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Neftyanik Stadium.
Aleksandr Troshechkin for Khimki gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ufa.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Ufa at Neftyanik Stadium.
The home team have replaced Vladislav Kamilov with Filip Mrzljak. This is the first substitution made today by Rashid Rahimov.
Oleg Danchenko is replacing Aleksandr Sukhov for Ufa at Neftyanik Stadium.
In the minute 46, Artem Golubev is on a sub for Kirill Folmer for Ufa.
Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Khimki's Aleksandr Filin has been booked in Ufa.
In the minute 49, Ufa have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
Khimki have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
Throw-in for Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 53, Ufa to take a throw-in in Khimki territory.
In Ufa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Denis Glushakov is booked for the away team.
In the minute 56, Khimki's Mohamed Konate gets in a shot on goal at Neftyanik Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ufa's Artem Golubev breaks free at Neftyanik Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Khimki goal kick.
In the minute 58, Khimki will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Ufa.
Important block from the Khimki defence as Vyacheslav Krotov fires in a strike for Ufa.
Stanislav Vasilev waits before resuming play because Vladimir Dyadyun for Khimki is still down.
In the minute 60, Vladimir Dyadyun for Khimki is back on the field again.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Stanislav Vasilev awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Khimki in their own half.
Free kick for Khimki in the half of Ufa.
Ufa's Komnen Andric attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 65, Khimki have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Khimki at Neftyanik Stadium.
Stanislav Vasilev awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 67, Ball safe as Khimki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a Ufa throw-in in Khimki's half.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a throw-in for Ufa, close to Khimki's area.
In the minute 68, Ufa advance rapidly upfield but Stanislav Vasilev blows for offside.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Khimki.
Throw-in for Ufa at Neftyanik Stadium.
In the minute 69, Can Ufa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Khimki's half?
Timur Zhamaletdinov (Ufa) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ufa pushes forward through Komnen Andric, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 71, Corner awarded to Ufa.
Ufa's Jemal Tabidze gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Stanislav Vasilev awards Khimki a goal kick.
In the minute 71, Rashid Rahimov (Ufa) is making a fourth substitution, with Dmitri Sysuev replacing Vyacheslav Krotov.
In Ufa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Ufa Ufa attack through Oleg Danchenko. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 75, Ball goes out of play for a Khimki goal kick.
Throw-in for Ufa in the half of Khimki.
Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 76, Bojan Jokic is booked for the home team and will be suspended from the next match.
Free kick Ufa.
Throw-in for Ufa close to the penalty box.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Ufa in the half of Khimki.
Ilya Kukharchuk (Khimki) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
In Ufa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ufa needs to be cautious. Khimki have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 82, Artem Golubev for Ufa has been booked by Stanislav Vasilev and receives a first yellow card.
Stanislav Vasilev awards Ufa a goal kick.
In the minute 83, Goal! Bojan Jokic pulls one back for Ufa to make it 1-2.
That's a fine assist from Timur Zhamaletdinov.
Khimki to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
In the minute 86, Khimki are in shooting range from this free kick.
Jemal Tabidze (Ufa) gets a yellow card. He will be suspended from the next match!
Ufa's Filip Mrzljak misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 87, It's a goal kick for the away team in Ufa.
Timur Zhamaletdinov for Ufa drives towards goal at Neftyanik Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 89, Filip Mrzljak (Ufa) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Khimki's Mohamed Konate has run offside.
Ufa have a dangerous throw-in.
Ufa have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
Aleksandr Belenov's header is off-target for Ufa.
Goal kick for Khimki at Neftyanik Stadium.
The match has come to a close in Ufa. The final score is 1-2.
